column5: Wow, what a tank!!  Is that a silk cloth wrapped around his tail?!  Very sensuous...
He couldn't hold on to the damn thing, so I grabbed a rag, lol!
Congrats to your Dad ... fish of a lifetime for sure !!!
They certainly are slippery..  A fish that size is tough to hold on to.  Well done!
Thats a real Beaut. Congrats to your pop.
That's a fish if a lifetime for sure bill !!!! Congrats to your pops !!!!! He should get a replica mount done,that would look amazing !!!!!
Good scrap i bet.  Wicked!
WOW!  NIce fish .  Congrats to PapaM

Huge fish, caught by Wolverine's old man. Awesome. Did you keep it or let it go? If that was my catch it would be going on the wall 110% What were you using?  Thats got to be the largest brookie I've ever seen pictured on this board. Well done.
sure it aint an atlantic? ...lol....congrates ...its a beaut!
Incredible specimen...It's a catch of a lifetime. Congrats!
Congrats to you and your father. Fish of a lifetime for anyone!  Awesome!
This one is going to be hard to beat...  24in, 7.5lbs.  Weighed it on two separate scales just to be sure.   Thickest brookie I've ever seen.
Holy Jeebus! That's a friggen tank!
LOL... That's awesome. That would pretty much be anyones PB. Congrats to the "Old Man".
Thanks Dan, like I said in my PM, I don't know who yelled and screamed more when we got it in the net, me or him!!!
nice
dang
That is a tank for sure!  Congrats to BillM senior!  Cheers, Ron...  (PS: GET OFF MY SPOT!!!) lol
Beast of a brookie.
Thanks Ron, really had to move around this year..   1 fish here, one fish there.    Mayflies were hatching all week, tough gig.
Wow!! Now that's a fish of a life time...what a gorgeous fish!!!  Thanks for sharing :-)
Nice fish!  Thanx for pix
Did he catch it on a large Wolverine spoon?
LOL!!!
Beauty, awesome colours
Very nice!
Nice brookie there congrats.
That sure is a beauty!!!
Way to go Mike, did you put Pops on the fish? you deserve an assist.   That is a fish of a lifetime, congrats to DAD.
Frank looks pretty happy, good for him!
Wow!! That is one serious Speck!!!
x2
Amazing! I'll be there for the week following Labor Day. Can hardly wait.
what a pig congrats to you and your dad
Beauty fish. Your old man looks like he would fit in well at a British pub drinking a Guinness and smoking a pipe
that's a beast of a fish!!  Old man's smile is priceless and i'm sure the one on your face while you took this pic was equally big!  Nick
